title: Filled with cheaters
text:
Been playing this game for years! It is the closest thing to real life pool with realistic cue ball control and effects. However, of late, it‚Äôs been filled with cheaters using hacks to win games.

Their cue automatically lines up to hit 3 and 5 cushion shots each time to make the most ridiculous, impossible pots multiple times in a row. Not sure what the hackers get by winning fake coins with no $ value, but clearly gives them some pleasure. 

It‚Äôs just annoying and the game developers don‚Äôt seem to take any action or fix it.

title: Cheating
text: This game is truly awesome. It showcases skills of the game, English users, trick shots, and knowledge of the game. But once you start to take your skills to higher tables, players use cheating tactics to win. Either run the table to lose. Tables under 25 million showcase skills whereas higher tables rely on cheat lines to know how to play. Ruins the fun of the game.

title: Good Game But Filled With Hackers
text:
This is a good game to spend some time on, it is enjoyable, well made, and in general, the experience is really good as you‚Äôre leveling up, getting new and powerful cues, as well as playing on higher bet tables. They definitely have it figured out in regards to user experience.
The problem with this game, and it is a huge one, is that it is filled with Hackers, mostly on high bet tables. I‚Äôve been playing this game for years and have billions in coins, so obviously I opt to play in the table with most money, and I‚Äôve had days in which I play against many hackers, one day I matched up against 7 different ones in a row‚Ä¶ it just gets to a point where it is too many too often and it seems like they don‚Äôt care at all.
All I can say is that there seems to be more and more hackers everyday and they are not committed nor willing to do something to change that.

title: Bugs
text: I don‚Äôt like that when you‚Äôre about to start playing and you click 1v1 and it‚Äôs automatically on entry fee of 500,000 coins. I was trying to swipe over and accidentally clicked it and hit the red button to go back and it made me play it anyway. Then to make matters worse the person I was paired with was 3x my level and was obviously better than I was. Im only complaining because I didn‚Äôt want to play and clicked off before the match started and it forced me in the match anyway and I lost all of my coins so I uninstalled the app!

title: Ads are terrible
text: I've been playing this game for years, it's a good game. However, the ads are absolutely awful and make playing the game not fun. You can't leave or finish a single game without 3-4 ads popping up after each one. And they're the same ads every time! No I do not want to spend $15-$30 on pool cues - stop asking! I also wish that after you finish a game, the game options automatically goes back to the game you were playing. If I want to play the 100 coin bets each game, it shouldn't restart and start at the game option where you can accidentally click on it and bet all your coins. Lastly, once you finish a game, there should always be a button to play a new game without having to verse the same person or leave out of the finished game screen to choose a new game. Maybe also add in free chat options for people you're friends with? The quality of the app has gone down the past couple years.

title: Punishes winning players
text: All right, no matter how good you are it will find a way to cheat. You either continuously pocket the cue ball on your last shot and or in general or it finds a way to get the 8 ball in. title: The amount of cheating is making this game unplayable
text:
The actual game play is decent, although far too many advertisements.

The major problem is that there are a massive amount of cheaters now, to the point where it‚Äôs pretty much unplayable now.  The reporting system is terrible to because by the time you‚Äôre sure that the opponent is cheating there isn‚Äôt time to report the cheaters.  The reporting system closes the instant that the game is over, so even if you‚Äôre making a report you often can actually complete it, and you can‚Äôt make the report after the game is over.

This game needs a major revamp to address both the cheating issue and the reporting issue.
